entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who serve Lord Voldemort. They have taken over the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: A wizarding newspaper that has been taken over by Death Eaters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is furious about the situation.

relationships.description: Death Eaters have taken over the Daily Prophet, as mentioned by Hermione and Lupin.
Hermione is concerned about the actions of Death Eaters.
